text:
An essential part of this commitment involves transparently sharing how we collect, use, store, and protect your data.
We will retain and use your information to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our policies.
Like any other website, useorbit.io uses 'cookies'.

They automatically receive your IP address when this occurs.
Third-party ad servers or ad networks uses technologies like cookies, JavaScript, or Web Beacons that are used in their respective advertisements and links that appear on useorbit.io, which are sent directly to users' browser.
